snippet.title: POLTER PALS | PAX Online Trailer | Coming to Steam in 2021
snippet.description:
Make ghost friends by possessing the living and steering them into deadly hazards to release their souls. Puzzle through diorama-style levels and figure out how to make as many friends as possible using comically fatal accidents. Keep up with the latest memes by getting popular on the afterlife's hottest social media app, LiveBurial. Get a unique look at the dysfunctional, hyper-consumerist world of the living through the posts of your social media-obsessed Polter Pals.

Wishlist today on Steam. Demo available now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1303860/Polter_Pals/

Follow Split Hare Games on Twitter: https://twitter.com/splitharegames

Join the Split Hare Games Discord community:  https://discord.gg/E8HnX5c


Leopard Print Elevator Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
